summary: The life of a young girl living with her mother in the slums of Manila becomes unbearable when her mother's young boyfriend moves in with them.
cast: Hilda Koronel|Mona Lisa|Rez Cortez|Marlon Ramirez|Ruel Vernal|Nina Lorenzo|Mely Mallari|Carpi Asturias|George Atutubo|Eddie Pagayon|Joe Jardi|Danilo Posadas|Estrella Antonio|Jimmy Calaguas|Belen Chikote|Tommy Yap|The PETA Kalinangan Ensemble
keywords: rape|character name as title|forename as title|mother daughter relationship|actual animal killed
title: Insiang
